EmailReportBySubject - Class in hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq
This class is used by the class AcqNewArrivalMonthReportBySch under hk.edu.ouhk.lib to email the fetched reports.
EmailReportBySubject() - Constructor for class hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq.EmailReportBySubject
Initialize an object; in order to send an email report; report file must be set via setReportFileStr() and sendEmail() must be called.
EmailReportBySubject(String) - Constructor for class hk.edu.ouhk.lib.acq.EmailReportBySubject
Initialize an object and an email report will be send right after this; the report file must in the form [schCode]-[any string].[extension].
